divy19:2: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
divy19:3: rājagṛhe nagare subhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ |
divy19:6: sa tayā sārdhaṁ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
divy19:7: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṁvṛttā |
divy19:8: bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat |
divy19:9: rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya caran yena subhadrasya gṛhapater niveśanaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy19:11: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmādāya yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy19:12: upasaṁkramya bhagavantamidamavocat—bhagavan, iyaṁ me patnī āpannasattvā saṁvṛttā |
divy19:14: bhagavānāha—gṛhapate, putraṁ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyati |
divy19:15: tena bhagavataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūro dattaḥ |
divy19:18: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadapyasmākamekaṁ bhikṣakulam, tadapi śramaṇo gautamo ’nvāvartayati |
divy19:19: gacchāmi, paśyāmi kiṁ śramaṇena gautamena vyākṛtamiti |
divy19:20: sa tatra gatvā kathayati—gṛhapate, śramaṇo gautama āgata āsīt? āgataḥ |
divy19:21: kiṁ tena vyākṛtam? ārya, mayā tasya patnī darśitā—kiṁ janayiṣyati? sa kathayati—putraṁ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyatīti |
divy19:22: sa bhūriko gaṇitre kṛtāvī śvetavarṇāṁ gṛhītvā gaṇayitumārabdhah—paśyati yathā bhagavatā vyākṛtaṁ tatsarvaṁ tathaiva |
divy19:23: sa saṁlakṣayati—yadi anusaṁvarṇyiṣyāmyaham, gṛhapatirbhūyasyā mātrayā śramaṇasya gautamasyābhipraśaṁsyati |
divy19:24: tadatra kiṁcid saṁvarṇayitavyaṁ kiṁcit vivarṇayitavyamiti viditvā hastau saṁparivartayati, mukhaṁ ca vibhaṇḍayati |
divy19:25: subhadro gṛhapatiḥ kathayati—ārya, kiṁ hastausamparivartayasi mukhaṁ ca vibhaṇḍayasīti? sa kathayati—gṛhapate, atra kiṁcit satyaṁ kiṁcinmṛṣā |
divy19:26: ārya, kiṁ satyaṁ kiṁ vā mṛṣā? gṛhapate, yadanenoktaṁ putraṁ janayiṣyatīti, idaṁ satyaṁ kathayati |
divy19:29: mandabhāgyaḥ sa sattvo jātamātra evāgninā kulaṁ dhakṣyati |
divy19:30: yat kathayati—divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti, idaṁ mṛṣā |
divy19:31: gehapate, asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭo manuṣyabhūto divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhavan? yatkathayati—mama śāsane pravrajiṣyatīti, idaṁ satyam |
divy19:32: yadā asya na bhaktaṁ na vastram, tadā niścayena śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajiṣyati |
divy19:34: śramaṇasyaiva tāvadgautamasya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ nāsti, prāgevāsya bhaviṣyatīti |
divy19:35: subhadro viṣādamāpannaḥ kathayati—ārya, atra mayā kathaṁ pratipattavyamiti? bhūrikaḥ kathayati—gṛhapate, vayaṁ pravrajitāḥ śamānuśikṣāḥ |
divy19:38: subhadraḥ saṁlakṣayati—sarvathā parityājyo ’sau iti viditvā sa bhaiṣajyaṁ dātumārabdhaḥ |
divy19:45: asthānametadanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo ’ntarāducchidya kālaṁ kariṣyati aprāpte āśravakṣaye |
divy19:48: te tvaritatvaritaṁ gatāḥ pṛcchanti—bhavantaḥ, kimiyaṁ gṛhapatipatnī virauti? subhadraḥ kathayati—kukṣimatyeṣā |
divy19:53: sā tenāraṇyaṁ nītvā tathopakrāntā yathā kālagatā |
divy19:54: sa tāṁ pracchannaṁ gṛhamānīya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāṁ prātiveśakānāṁ ca kathayati—bhavantaḥ, patnī me kālagateti |
divy19:56: sā tairvikrośadbhir nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṁkṛtya śītavanaṁ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā |
divy19:57: nirgranthaiḥ śrutam—te hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditāśchatrapatākā ucchrayitvā rājagṛhasya nagarasya rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭake upāhiṇḍamānā ārocayanti—śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ |
divy19:58: śramaṇena gautamena subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā—putraṁ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyati |
divy19:60: yasya tāvadvṛkṣamūlameva nāsti, kutastasya śākhāpatraphalaṁ bhaviṣyatīti? atrāntare kiṁcidbuddhānāṁ bhagavatāmajñātamadṛṣṭamaviditamavijñātam |
divy19:61: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ mahākāruṇikānāṁ lokānugrahapravṛttānāmekārakṣāṇāṁ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṁ caturṣu saṁgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānām caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṁ caturṣu saṁgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṁ caturvaiśāradyaviśāradyaviśāradānāṁ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṁ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṁ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṁ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāmasaṁhatavihāriṇāṁ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānāmaṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṁ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṁ daśabalabalināṁ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṁ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṁ trī rātres trirdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṁ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṁ pravartate—ko hīyate, ko vardhate, kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṁkaṭaprāptaḥ, kaḥ saṁbādhaprāptaḥ, kaḥ kṛcchrasaṁkaṭasambādhaprāptaḥ, ko ’pāyaniṁnaḥ, ko ’pāyapravaṇah, ko ’pāyaprāgbhāraḥ, kamahamapāyāduddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam, kasyānavaropitāni kuśalamūlānyavaropayeyam, kasyāvaropitāni paripācayeyam, kasya paripakkāni vimocayeyam |
divy19:66: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti, tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti, kāścidupariṣṭādgacchanti |
divy19:67: yā adhastādgacchanti, tāḥ saṁjīvaṁ kālasūtraṁ saṁghātaṁ rauravaṁ mahārauravaṁ tapanaṁ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṁ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṁ hahavaṁ huhavamutpalaṁ padma mahāpadmaṁ narakaṁ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti |
divy19:69: teṣāmevaṁ bhavati—kiṁ nu vayaṁ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, āhosvidanyatropapannā iti |
divy19:71: teṣāṁ nirmitaṁ dṛṣṭvā evaṁ bhavati—na hyeva vayaṁ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ, nāpyanyatropapannāḥ |
divy19:72: api tvayamapūrvadarśanaḥ sattvaḥ, asyānubhāvādasmākaṁ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhā iti |
divy19:73: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṁ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṁdhiṁ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṁ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti |
divy19:74: yā upariṣṭāgacchanti, tāścāturmahārājakāyikān devāṁstrāyastriṁśām yāmāṁstuṣitānnirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrāhmaṇaḥ parīttābhānapramāṇābhānābhāsvarān parīttaśubhānapramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnānanabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānatapān sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā duḥkhaṁ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti |
divy19:75: gāthādvayaṁ ca bhāṣante— ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkrāmata yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane |
divy19:79: atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṁ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti |
divy19:81: athāyuṣmānānandaḥ kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṁ papraccha— nānāvidho raṅgasahasracitro vaktrāntarānniṣkasitaḥ kalāpaḥ |
divy19:83: gāthāśca bhāṣate— vigatodbhavā dainyamadaprahīṇā buddhā jagatyuttamahetubhūtāḥ |
divy19:85: tatkālaṁ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṁ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām |
divy19:88: yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti nāthāstaṁ śrotuṁ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ (7)|
divy19:91: nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṁ prāviṣkurvanti |
divy19:92: gaccha ānanda, bhikṣūṇāmārocaya—tathāgato bhikṣavaḥ śmaśānacārikāṁ gantukāmaḥ |
divy19:93: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṁ śmaśānacārikāṁ gantum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu |
divy19:94: evaṁ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati—tathāgata āyuṣmantaḥ śmaśānacārikāṁ gantukāmaḥ |
divy19:95: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṁ śmaśānacārikaṁ gantum, sa cīvarakāṇi gṛhṇātu |
divy19:96: evamāyuṣmanniti te bhikṣavaḥ sarve saṁśrutya bhagavatsakāśamupagatāḥ |
divy19:97: atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvāstaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro ’rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gajarāja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ siṁha iva daṁṣṭagaṇaparivṛto haṁsarāja iva haṁsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva parikṣagaṇaparivṛto vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaścakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaścandra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntairindrayairasaṁkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛto ’śītyā cānuvyañjanairvirājitagātro vyāmaprabhālaṁkṛtamūrtiḥ sūryasahasrātirekaprabho jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānairmahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgata ājñātakauṇḍinyāśvajidbāṣpamahānāmabhadrikaśāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapayaśaḥpūrṇaprabhṛtimahāśrāvakaiḥ parivṛto ’nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṁghena anekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śītavanaṁ mahāśmaśānaṁ saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy19:98: aṣṭādaśānuśaṁsā buddhacārikāyāmityanekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato ’nubaddhāni |
divy19:101: rājagṛhāt dvau bāladārakau brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kṣatriyadārakaśca bahir nirgatya krīḍataḥ |
divy19:103: sa brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kṣatriyadārakasya kathayati—vayasya, bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā—putraṁ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyatīti |
divy19:104: sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṁ śmaśānaṁ nirhṛtā—mā haiva bhagavatā bhāṣitaṁ vitathaṁ syāditi |
divy19:105: sa kṣatriyadārako gāthāṁ bhāṣate—sacandratāraṁ prapatedihāmbaraṁ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet |
divy19:106: mahodadhīnāmudakaṁ kṣayaṁ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ (8)|
divy19:107: iti sa ca brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kathayati—vayasya, yadyevam, gacchāmaḥ śītavanaṁ mahāśmaśānaṁ paśyāmah? vayasya, gacchāmaḥ |
divy19:111: dṛṣṭvā ca punargāthāṁ bhāṣate— anuddhato vigatakutūhalo muniryathā vrajatyeṣa janaughasaṁvṛtaḥ |
divy19:113: yathā hyamī śītavanonmukhotsukāḥ pravānti vātā himapaṅkaśītalāḥ |
divy19:114: prayānti nūnaṁ bahavo divaukaso nirīkṣituṁ śākyamunervikurvitam (10)|
divy19:116: rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutam—bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā—putraṁ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyati |
divy19:117: sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṁ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā |
divy19:119: śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat—na bhagavān nirarthakaṁ śītavanaṁ gacchati |
divy19:120: nūnaṁ bhagavān subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnīmāgamya mahadvineyakāryaṁ kartukāmo bhaviṣyati |
divy19:123: adrākṣīt sa kṣatriyakumārako rājānaṁ māgadhaśreṇyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dūrādeva |
divy19:124: dṛṣṭvā ca punargāthāṁ bhāṣate— yathā hi śreṇyo magadhādhipo hyayaṁ viniryayau rājagṛhāt sabāndhavaḥ |
divy19:125: pravartate me hṛdi niścitā matirmahājanasyābhyudayo bhaviṣyati (11)|
divy19:129: nirgrantha bhagavantaṁ smitonmukhaṁ dṛṣṭvā saṁlakṣayanti—yathā śramaṇo gautamaḥ smitonmukho mahājanamadhyaṁ praviṣṭaḥ, nūnamayaṁ bodhisattvo na kālagataḥ |
divy19:130: taiḥ subhadro gṛhapatiruktah—gṛhapate, nanvayaṁ sattvo mandabhāgyo na kālagata iti |
divy19:131: sa kathayati—ārya yadyevam, kathamatra pratipattavyamiti? te kathayanti—gṛhapate, vayaṁ śamāttaśikṣāḥ, tvameva jñāsyasīti |
divy19:133: tasyāḥ sarvaḥ kāyo dagdhaḥ sthāpayitvā kukṣisāmantakam |
divy19:135: tasya coparipadmakarṇikāyāṁ kumāro niṣaṇṇo ’bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ |
divy19:136: taṁ dṛṣṭvā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi paraṁ vismayamupagatāni |
divy19:138: tatra bhagavān subhadraṁ gṛhapatimāmantrayate—gṛhapate, gṛhāṇa kumāram |
divy19:140: te kathayanti—gṛhapate, yadi prajvalitāmetāṁ citāṁ pravekṣyasi, sarveṇa sarvaṁ na bhaviṣyasīti |
divy19:142: tatra bhagavāñ jīvakaṁ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate—gṛhāṇa jīvaka kumārakamiti |
divy19:148: tato jīvakaṁ kumārabhūtamidamavocat—jīvaka, māsi kṣata upahato veti? sa kathayati—rājakule ’haṁ bhadanta jāto rājakule vṛddhaḥ |
divy19:150: tatra bhagavān subhadraṁ gṛhapatimāmantrayate—gṛhāṇedānīṁ gṛhapate kumāramiti |
divy19:154: te kathayanti—gṛhapate, ayaṁ sattvo ’tīva mandabhāgyo yo hi nāma sarvabhakṣeṇāpyagninā na dagdhaḥ |
divy19:155: kiṁ bahunā? yadyevaṁ gṛhaṁ praveśayasi, nīyatām |
divy19:156: te gṛhamutsādayad bhaviṣyasi, tvaṁ ca prāṇairviyujyasa iti |
divy19:159: tatra bhagavān rājānaṁ bimbisāramāmantayate—gṛhāṇa mahārāja kumāramiti |
divy19:161: tataḥ samantato nirīkṣya kathayati—bhagavan, kiṁ bhavatu asya dārakasya jyotiṣka iti nāmeti |
divy19:163: tato bhagavatā tasya janakāyasyāśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā bahubhiḥ sattvaśatairmahān viśeṣo ’dhigataḥ |
divy19:164: kaiścicchrotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścidanāgāmiphalam, kaicit sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiściduṣmagatāni kuśalamūlānyutpāditāni, kaiścinmūrdhānaḥ, kaiścit mṛdumadhyāḥ kṣāntayaḥ, kaiścicchrāvakabodhau cittānyutpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekabodhau, kaiścidanuttarāyāṁ samyaksambodhau, kaiściccharaṇagamanāni, kaiścicchikṣāpadāni |
divy19:165: yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṁnā dharmapravaṇā saṁghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā |
divy19:166: jyotiṣko dārako rājñā bimbisāreṇa aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo ’nupradatto dvābhyāsaṁsadhātrībhyāṁ dvābhyāṁ kṣīradhāgtrībhyāṁ dvābhyāṁ maladhātrībhyāṁ dvābhyāṁ krīḍanikābhyāṁ dhātrībhyām |
divy19:167: so ’ṣṭhābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ |
divy19:171: tena śrutam yathā mama bhaginī sattvavatī saṁvṛttā |
divy19:172: sā bhagavatā vyākṛtā—putraṁ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyoyiṣyati, divyāmānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyatīti |
divy19:174: tena śrutam yathā sā asmākaṁ bhaginī kālagateti |
divy19:175: śrutvā ca punaḥ saṁlakṣayati—bhagavatā asau vyākṛtā putraṁ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyāṁ mānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyatīti |
divy19:176: mā haiva tabhagavato bhāṣitaṁ vitathaṁ syāt |
divy19:177: tena tiraḥprātiveśyāḥ pṛṣṭāh—śrutaṁ mayā asmākaṁ bhaginī sattvavatī saṁvṛttā |
divy19:178: sā bhagavatā vyākṛtā putraṁ janayiṣyati, kulamuddyotayiṣyati, divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyati, mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyatīti |
divy19:181: mā haiva bhagavato bhāṣitaṁ vitathaṁ syāditi |
divy19:182: te gāthāṁ bhāṣante— sacandratāraṁ prapatedihāmbaraṁ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet |
divy19:183: mahodadhīnāmudakaṁ kṣayaṁ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ (13)|
divy19:185: kathaṁ bhagavato bhāṣitaṁ vitathaṁ bhaviṣyati? kiṁ tu tena svāmināpi asau tathā tathā upakrāntā, yathā kālagatā |
divy19:189: sa subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṁ gatvā kathayati—na yuktaṁ gṛhapate tvayā kṛtam |
divy19:190: kiṁ kṛtam? asmākaṁ sattvavatī bhaginī tvayā nirgranthavigrāhitena tathā tathā upakrāntā, yathā kālagatā |
divy19:197: salokānām sālohitānām? saṁkāraṁ pātayāmaḥ, rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṁ niścārayāmah—asmākaṁ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā |
divy19:202: yathaiṣa paribhāṣate, nūnamevaṁ karomīti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati— deva, mama jñātaya evaṁ paribhāṣante—yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṁ kuśalam, no cedānayasi, vayaṁ tvāṁ jñātimadhyādutkṣipāmaḥ, saṁkāraṁ pātayāmaḥ, rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṁ niścārayāmah—asmākaṁ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā |
divy19:207: rājā kathayati—gṛhapate, na mayā tvatsakāśāt jyotiṣkaḥ kumāro gṛhītaḥ, kiṁ tu bhagavatā mama nyastaḥ |
divy19:210: pādayor nipatya kathayati—bhagavan, mama jñātaya evaṁ paribhāṣante—yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṁ kuśalam |
divy19:211: no cedānayasi, vayaṁ tvāṁ jñātimadhyādutkṣipāmaḥ, saṁkāraṁ pātayāmaḥ, rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṁ niścārayāmaḥ |
divy19:217: bhagavān saṁlakṣayati—yadi subhadro jyotiṣkaṁ kumāraṁ na labhate, sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṁ rudhiraṁ chardayitvā kālaṁ kariṣyati |
divy19:218: iti viditvā āyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate—gaccha ānanda, rājānaṁ bimbisāraṁ madvacanenārogyaya, evaṁ ca vada—anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṁ kumāram |
divy19:219: yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṁ kumāraṁ na labhate, sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṁ śoṇitaṁ chardayitvā kālaṁ kariṣyatīti |
divy19:220: evaṁ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā bimbisārastenopasaṁskrāntaḥ |
divy19:221: upasaṁkramya rājānaṁ bimbisārametadavocat—bhagavāṁste mahārāja ārogyayati, kathayati ca—anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṁ kumāram |
divy19:222: yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṁ kumāraṁ na labhate, sthānametadvidyate yat subhadro gṛhapatiruṣṇaṁ śoṇitaṁ chardayitvā kālaṁ kariṣye |
divy19:226: rājā bimbisāraḥ kathayati—gṛhapate, mayā ayaṁ kumāraḥ saṁvardhitaḥ |
divy19:228: samayato ’haṁ muñcāmi, yadi māṁ divase divase triṣkālaṁ darśanāyopasaṁkrāmatīti |
divy19:230: ko ’nya upasaṁkramitavya iti? sa rājñā sarvālaṁkāravibhūṣitaṁ kṛtvā hastiskandha āropya visarjitaḥ |
divy19:232: ācaritametallokasya—na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat pitā jīvati |
divy19:236: buddhaṁ śaraṇaṁ gato dharmaṁ saṁghaṁ śaraṇaṁ gataḥ |
divy19:237: tena yasmin pradeśe tena subhadreṇa patnī āghātitā, tasmin pradeśe vihāraṁ kārayitvā sarvāpakaraṇasampūrṇaścāturdiśāryabhikṣusaṁghāya niryātitaḥ |
divy19:238: tathā sthavirairapi sūtrānta upanibaddham—bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati mṛditakukṣike dāva iti |
divy19:240: subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ pauruṣeyā ye paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṁ gatāḥ, taiḥ śrutam—subhadro gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ |
divy19:242: sa buddhe ’bhiprasanno dharme saṁghe ’bhiprasanno buddhaṁ śaraṇaṁ gato dharmaṁ saṁghaṁ śaraṇaṁ gata iti |
divy19:246: ghaṇḍāvaghoṣaṇaṁ kāritam—nedaṁ kenacit viṣṭayā vā śītayā vā karkaṭakena vā gṛhītavyam |
divy19:247: ya etacchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā maharddhiko vā mahānubhāvah ṛddhyā gṛhṇāti, tasyedam yathāsukhamiti |
divy19:250: dṛṣṭvā ca punarjyotiṣkasya gṛhapateḥ kathayanti—gṛhapate, kimetaditi? tena teṣāṁ vistareṇārocitam |
divy19:253: yāvat sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṁ piṇḍāya praviṣṭāḥ |
divy19:254: tairdṛṣṭvā tairapi jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ pṛṣṭah—kimetaditi? tena tathaiva vistareṇa samākhyātam |
divy19:255: te kathayanti—gṛhapate, kiṁ pātramātrasyārthāyātmānaṁ saṁprakāśayāmah? uktaṁ bhagavatā—pracchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṁ dhūtapāpairityuktvā prakrāntāḥ |
divy19:258: āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ saṁlakṣayati—yena mayā anādikālopacitaṁ kleśagaṇaṁ vāntaṁ tyaktaṁ charditaṁ pratinisṛṣṭam, taṁ māṁ gṛhapatistīrthikasādhāraṇayā ṛddhyā āhvayati |
divy19:261: sa tadgṛhītvā vihāraṁ gato bhikṣubhirucyate—sthavira, kutastava gośīrṣacandanamayaṁ pātramiti? tena yathāvṛttamārocitam |
divy19:262: bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti—sthavira, kalpate tava pātramātrasyārthāya ṛddhiṁ vidarśayitumiti? kathayati—āyuṣmantaḥ, kalpatu vā mā vā |
divy19:264: kiṁ kriyatāmiti? etat prakaraṇaṁ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti |
divy19:267: api tu catvāri pātrāṇi suvarṇamayaṁ rūpyamayaṁ varḍūryamayaṁ sphaṭikamayam |
divy19:268: aparāṇyapi catvāri pātrāṇi rītimayaṁ tāmramayaṁ kaṁsamayamabhramayaṁ ca |
divy19:269: tatra yāni pūrvakāṇi catvāri pātrāṇi, etānyanupasthāpitāni nopasthāpayitavyāni, upasthāpitāni visarjayitavyāni |
divy19:270: yāni paścimāni catvāri pātrāṇi, etānyanupasthāpitāni nopasthāpayitavyāni, uapsthāpitāni tu bhaiṣajyaśaravaparibhogena paribhoktavyāni |
divy19:271: api tvadhīṣṭāni te dve pātre āyasaṁ mṛṇmayam |
divy19:272: yāvadapareṇa samayena jyotiṣkasya gṛhapaterdivyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā |
divy19:273: antarā ca rājagṛhamantarā ca campāmatrāntare śulkaśālā |
divy19:276: tena putrāṇāṁ svapnadarśanaṁ dattam—yaḥ kaścit paṇyamaśulkayitvā gamiṣyati, sā ghaṇṭā tāvadviraviṣyati yāvadasau nivartya śulkaṁ dāpayitavyamiti (yiṣyatīti?) |
divy19:277: taistaṁ svapnaṁ saṁbandhibāndhavānāṁ nivedya divasatithimuhūrtena tasmin pradeśe yakṣasthānaṁ kāritam |
divy19:282: sā brāhmaṇī saṁlakṣayati—ayaṁ brāhmaṇo yaistairupāyairdhanopārjanaṁ karoti |
divy19:288: tayā brāhmaṇa uktah—brāhmaṇa, asyā yamalyāḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasraṁ mūlyam |
divy19:290: yadi kaścit yācati, kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa dātavyā, no cedapattanaṁ ghoṣayitvā anyatra gantavyamiti |
divy19:293: so ’pattanaṁ ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīṁ chatradaṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdhaṁ rājagṛhaṁ saṁprasthito yāvadanupūrveṇa śulkaśālāmanuprāptaḥ |
divy19:297: śailkikāḥ kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, yatheyaṁ ghaṇṭā raṇati, nūnaṁ sārtho na nipuṇaṁ śulkitaḥ |
divy19:304: sārthikā avadhyātumārabdhāh—kim yūyamasamān bhūṣitukāmā yena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pratinivartayadhvamiti? tairasau dvidhā kṛtvā muktaḥ |
divy19:305: yeṣāṁ madhye sa brāhmaṇo nāsti, te ’tikrāntāḥ |
divy19:306: anyeṣāṁ gacchatāṁ sā ghaṇṭā tathaiva raṭitumārabdhā |
divy19:308: evaṁ tāvat dvidhākṛtāḥ, yāvat sa caiko brāhmaṇo ’vasthita iti |
divy19:313: tairasau brāhmaṇaḥ pratinivartyoktah—bho brāhmaṇa kathaya, naiva śulkaṁ dāpayāmaḥ |
divy19:314: kiṁ tu devasyaiva sānnidhyaṁ jñātaṁ bhavatīti |
divy19:317: te paraṁ vismayamāpannāh—bhavantaḥ, īdṛśamapi devasya sānnidhyamiti |
divy19:319: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati—yūyaṁ kathayatha śulkaṁ na dāpayāma iti |
divy19:322: api devasyaitat sānnidhyamiti kṛtvā asmābhiḥ prāvṛtaḥ |
divy19:324: sa taṁ punargṛhītvā punaśchatranāḍikāyāṁ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ |
divy19:327: tatrāpi tāṁ na kaścit kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa yācate |
divy19:329: jyotiṣkaśca kumāro rājakulānniṣkramya hastiskandhābhirūḍho vīthīmadhyena svagṛhaṁ gacchati |
divy19:332: jyotiṣkeṇoktah—bho brāhmaṇa, kimarthaṁ tvam apattanaṁ ghoṣayasi? gṛhapate, asyā yamalyāḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasraṁ mūlyam |
divy19:341: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati—kimetadevaṁ bhaviṣyati? jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati—brāhmaṇa, tava pratyakṣīkaromi |
divy19:349: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati—brāhmaṇa, punaḥ paśyainam yo ’sau aparibhuktaka iti, sa kaṇṭakavāṭasyopariṣṭāt kṣipto ’sajjamāno gataḥ |
divy19:351: sa brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasannaḥ kathayati—gṛhapate, maharddhikastvaṁ ṁhānubhāvaḥ |
divy19:358: jyotiṣkeṇa tato yaḥ paribhuktakaḥ sa dārakāya dattaḥ, aparibhuktakastu snānaśāṭakaḥ kṛtaḥ |
divy19:360: jyotiṣkasya sa snānaśāṭaka upari gṛhasyābhyavakāśe śoṣito vāyunā hriyamāṇo rājño bimbisārasyopari patitaḥ |
divy19:363: te kathayanti—deva, śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṁ hiraṇyavarṣaṁ patitam |
divy19:366: rājā kathayati—bhavantaḥ, jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti |
divy19:371: rājā kathayati—kumāra, tvaṁ bhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti |
divy19:377: sa vismṛtya kathayati—deva, madīyo ’yaṁ snānaśāṭako vāyunopakṣipta ihāgata iti |
divy19:378: kumāra, tava divyamānuṣyakī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā? deva, prādurbhūtā |
divy19:379: kumāra, yadyevam, kimarthaṁ na nimantrayasi? deva, nimantrito bhava |
divy19:381: deva, yasya divyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā, kiṁ tena sajjīkartavyam? nanu sajjīkṛtameva, gaccheti |
divy19:391: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati—deva, ayamapi na vadhūjanaḥ, kiṁ tu madhyo ’yaṁ janaḥ |
divy19:396: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati—deva kasyārthe upānahau apanayasīti? sa kathayati—kumāra, pānīyamuttarttavyamiti |
divy19:398: sa kathayati—kumāra, ime matsyā upari bhramantaḥ paśyanti |
divy19:406: rājā kathayati—kumāra, kasmādayaṁ vadhūjano roditi? deva nāyaṁ roditi, kiṁ tu devasya kāṣṭhadhūmena vastrāṇi dhūpitāni, tena āsāmaśrupato jāta iti |
divy19:407: rājā tatra divyamānuṣyā śriyā upacaryamāṇaḥ pramatto na niṣkrāṁti |
divy19:409: amātyairajātaśatruḥ kumāro ’bhibhūtah—kumāra, devo jyotiṣkasya gṛhaṁ praviśya pramattaḥ |
divy19:411: tena gatvā uktah—deva, kimatra praviśyāvasthitah? amātyāḥ kathayanti—rājakṛtyāni rājakaraṇīyāni parihīyanta iti |
divy19:412: sa kathayati—kumāra, na śaknoṣi tvamekaṁ divasaṁ rājyaṁ kārayitum? kiṁ devo jānīte—mamaiko divasaḥ praviṣṭasaya? adya devasya saptamo divaso vartate |
divy19:413: rājā jyotiṣkasya mukhaṁ nirīkṣya kathayati—kumāra satyam? deva satyam |
divy19:415: kumāra, kathaṁ rātrijñāyate divaso vā? deva, puṣpāṇāṁ saṁkocavikāsānmaṇīnāṁ jvalanājvalanayogācchakunīnāṁ ca kūjanākūjanāt |
divy19:416: santi tāni puṣpāṇi yāni rātrau vikasanti, divā mlāyanti? santi yāni divā vikasanti rātrau mlāyanti? santi te maṇayo ye rātrau jvālanti, na divā? santi ye divā jvalanti, na rātrau? santi te śakunayo ye rātrau kūjanti, na divā? santi ye divā kūjñati, na rātrau? rājā vismayamāpannaḥ kathayati—kumāra, avitathavādī bhagavān |
divy19:417: yathā tvaṁ bhagavatā vyākṛtastathaiva nānyathetyuktvā jyotiṣkagṛhāt niṣkrāntaḥ |
divy19:418: ajātaśatrukumāreṇa jyotiṣkasantako maṇirapahṛtya dārakasya haste dattaḥ |
divy19:420: ajātaśatruḥ kathayati—dāraka, ānaya taṁ maṇiṁ paśyāmīti |
divy19:421: sa muṣṭhiṁ vighāṭya kathayati—kumāra, na jāne kutra gata iti |
divy19:423: jyotiṣkaḥ kathayati—kumāra, kimarthamenaṁ tāḍayasi? ghapate, ahaṁ cauraḥ, eṣa mahācauraḥ |
divy19:425: sa kathayati—kumāra, na tvayā apahṛto nāpyanena, api tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītastatraiva gatvā avasthitaḥ |
divy19:426: api tu kumāra, svakaṁ te gṛham |
divy19:428: sa pratibhinnakaḥ saṁlakṣayate—yadā pituratyayādrājā bhaviṣyāmi, tadā grahīṣyāmīti |
divy19:429: yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, svayameva ca paṭṭaṁ baddhvā pratitiṣṭhitaḥ, tadā tena jyotiṣko ’bhihitah—gṛhapate, tvaṁ mama bhrātā bhavasi |
divy19:431: sa saṁlakṣayati—yena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ praghātitaḥ, sa māṁ marṣayatīti kuta etat? nūnamayaṁ madgṛhamāgacchatu, kāmaṁ prayacchāmīti viditvā kathayati—deva, vibhaktameva, kimatra vibhaktavyam? madīyaṁ gṛhamāgaccha, ahaṁ tvadīyaṁ gṛhamāgacchāmīti |
divy19:438: ajātaśatruḥ saṁlakṣayate—evamapi mayā na śakitaṁ jyotiṣkasya maṇīnapahartum |
divy19:446: teṣām yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ sa tatraivāsthito yāvat prabhātā rajanī saṁvṛttā |
divy19:448: te kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, anena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ |
divy19:451: tatkiṁ na me moṣiṣyata iti? purakṣobho jātaḥ |
divy19:452: ajātaśatruṇā jyotiṣkasay dūto ’nupreṣitah—muñcata mamāyaṁ khalīkāra saṁlakṣayate—yena nāma pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ, sa māṁ na praghātayitṣyatīti kuta etat? sarvathā ahaṁ bhagavatā vyākṛtah—mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarthattvaṁ sākṣātkariṣyatīti |
divy19:456: atha jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānavalokya yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy19:457: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy19:458: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat—labheyāhāṁ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy19:460: sa bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitah—ehi bhikṣo, cara brahmacaryamiti |
divy19:463: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṁghāṭiparītadehaḥ |
divy19:466: tenodyacchamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṁ saṁsāracakraṁ calācalaṁ viditvā sarvasaṁskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṁsanadharmatayā parāhatyasarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy19:467: arhan saṁvṛttastraidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṁvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparānmukhaḥ |
divy19:470: bhikṣavaḥ saṁśayajātāḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ papracchuh—kiṁ bhadanta āyuṣmatā jyotiṣkeṇa karma kṛtam yena citāmāropitaḥ, divyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā, bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtamiti? bhagavānāha—jyotiṣkeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṁhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayānyoghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni |
divy19:472: ko ’nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ kārmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
divy19:474: sāmagrīṁ prāpya kālaṁ ca phalanti khalu dehinām (15)|
divy19:475: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣava ekanavatikalpe vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato ’rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṁ buddho bhagavān |
divy19:476: dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṁ caran bandhumatīṁ rājadhānīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṁ viharati sma bandhumatīyake dāve |
divy19:477: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṁ rājadhānyāṁ bandhumān nāma rājā rājyaṁ kārayati ṛddhaṁ ca sphītaṁ ca kṣemaṁ ca subhikṣaṁ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṁ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṁ taskararogāpagataṁ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsampannam |
divy19:479: tasyānaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
divy19:480: sa saṁlakṣayate—bahuśo mayā vipaśyī samyaksambuddho ’ntargṛhe upanimantraya bhojitaḥ |
divy19:481: na tu kadācit traimāsīṁ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ |
divy19:482: yannvahaṁ vipaśyinaṁ samyaksambuddhaṁ traimāsīṁ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyam |
divy19:484: upasaṁkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy19:485: ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanaṅgaṇaṁ gṛhapatiṁ vipaśyī samyakasmbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṁpraharṣayati |
divy19:486: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
divy19:487: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṁ praṇamya vipaśyinaṁ samyaksambuddhamidavocat—adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṁs traimāsīṁ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṁ bhikṣusaṁgheneti |
divy19:489: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṁ viditvā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy19:490: aśrauṣīdbandhumān rājā—vipaśyī samyaksambuddho dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṁ caran bandhumatīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṁ viharati bandhumatīye dāve iti |
divy19:491: śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat—bahuśo mayā bhagavānantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojitaḥ |
divy19:492: na tu kadācit traimāsīṁ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ |
divy19:495: upasaṁkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy19:496: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṁ bandhumantaṁ rājānaṁ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṁpraharṣayati |
divy19:497: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
divy19:498: atha bandhumān rājā utthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṁ praṇamya vipaśyinaṁ samyaksambuddhamidamavocat—adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṁstraimāsīṁ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghena |
divy19:500: adhivāsayatu bhagavān, ahaṁ tathā kariṣye yathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirājñāsyati |
divy19:501: sacet te mahārāja anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatiranujānīte, evaṁ te ’hamadhivāsayāmi |
divy19:502: atha bandhumān rājā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena svaṁ nirveśanaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy19:503: bandhumān rājā anaṅgaṇaṁ gṛhapatiṁ dūtena prakrośyedamavocat—yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāt—ahaṁ tvatprathamato vipaśyinaṁ samyakasmbuddhaṁ bhojayāmi, tataḥ paścāt tavāpi na duṣkaraṁ bhaviṣyati vipaśyinaṁ samyaksambuddhaṁ bhojayitumiti |
divy19:504: sa kathayati—deva, mayā vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastvatprathamata upanimantritaḥ |
divy19:506: rājā kathayati—gṛhapate, yadyapyevam, tathāpi tvaṁ mama viṣayanivāsī |
divy19:507: nārhāmyahaṁ tvatprathamato bhojayitum? deva, yadyapyahaṁ tava viṣayanivāsī, tathāpi yena pūrvanimantritaḥ sa eva bhojayati |
divy19:510: api tu yo bhaktottarikayā jeṣyati, so ’vaśiṣṭaṁ kālaṁ bhojayiṣyati |
divy19:512: tathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṁ śuciṁ praṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ samudānīya kālyamevotthāyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati—samayo bhadanta, sajjaṁ bhaktam yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyate |
divy19:513: atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy19:515: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṁ buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṁ saṁtarpayati saṁpravārayati |
divy19:516: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṁ saṁtarpya saṁpravārya bhagavantaṁ bhuktavantaṁ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṁ nīcataramāsanaṁ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
divy19:517: atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddho ’naṅgaṇaṁ gṛhapatiṁ dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṁpraharṣayati |
divy19:518: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samuttejya saṁpraharṣya prakrāntaḥ |
divy19:522: tato bandhumān rājā kare kapolaṁ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
divy19:523: amātyāḥ kathayanti—deva, kasmāt tvaṁ kare kapolaṁ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti? sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, kathamahaṁ na cintāparastiṣṭhāmi yo ’haṁ mama viṣayanivāsinaṁ kuṭumbinaṁ na śaknomi bhaktottarikayā parājayitum? te kathayanti, deva, tasya gṛhapateḥ kāṣṭhaṁ nāsti |
divy19:526: bhavantaḥ, na kenacit madviṣayanivāsinā kāṣṭhaṁ vikretavyam |
divy19:527: yo vikrīṇīte, tena madviṣaye na vastavyamiti |
divy19:530: surabhiṇā gandhena sarvā bandhumatī nagarī sphuṭā saṁvṛttā |
divy19:531: bandhumān rājā pṛcchati—bhavantaḥ, kuta eṣa manojñagandha iti? tairvistareṇa samākhyātam |
divy19:533: kiṁ mama vibhavo nāstīti? amātyāḥ kathayanti—deva, kasyārthe evaṁ kriyate? ayaṁ gṛhapatiraputro nacirāt kālaṁ kariṣyati |
divy19:538: tena cittaṁ pradūṣya kharā vāg niścārita—tāvanme bhaktakāṣṭhamasti, yenāham enaṁ sahāmātyaṁ citāmāropya dhmāpayāmīti |
divy19:539: rājā kare kapolaṁ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
divy19:540: amātyāḥ kathayanti—deva, kimarthaṁ kare kapolaṁ dattvā cintāparistiṣṭhasīti? tena vistareṇa samākhyātam |
divy19:542: vayaṁ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā devaścānaṅgaṇaṁ gṛhapatiṁ parājayatīti |
divy19:543: tairaparasmin divase bandhumatī rājadhānī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyā vyavasthāpitā candanavāripariṣiktā surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibanddhā āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpā ucchritadhvajapatākā nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇā nandanavanodyānasadṛśā |
divy19:547: tato bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭvā paraṁ vismayamāpannaḥ |
divy19:548: tato vismayāvarjitacittasaṁtatirvipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya dūtena kālamārocayati—samaye bhadanta, sajjaṁ bhaktam yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyata iti |
divy19:549: atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṁghapuraskṛto yena bandhumato rājño bhaktābhisārastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy19:551: bandhumato rājño maṅgalyābhiṣeko hastināgo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṁ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati, avaśiṣṭā hastināhā bhikṣūṇām |
divy19:552: bandhumato rājño ’gramahiṣī vipaśyinaṁ samyaksambuddhaṁ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati, avaśiṣṭā antaḥpurikā avaśiṣṭānāṁ bhikṣūṇām |
divy19:553: anaṅgaṇena gṛhapatinā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah—gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, paśya kīdṛśenāhāreṇa bandhumān rājā buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ bhojayatīti |
divy19:558: so ’pi tāṁ vibhūtiṁ dṛṣṭvā paraṁ viṣādamāpannaḥ saṁlakṣayati—śakyamanyat saṁpādayitum |
divy19:559: kiṁ tu hastināmantaḥpurasya ca kuto mama vibhavah? iti viditvā niveśanaṁ gato dauvārikaṁ puruṣamāmantrayate—bhoḥ puruṣa, yadi kaścidyācanaka āgacchati, sa yat prārthayate taddātavyam, no tu praveśaḥ |
divy19:562: sa saṁlakṣayati—ye kecilloke dakṣiṇīyāḥ, vipaśyī samyaksambuddhasteṣāmagraḥ, dānapatīnāmapyanaṅgaṇo gṛhapatiḥ |
divy19:564: iti viditvā kauśiko brāhmaṇaveṣamabhinirmāya yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapater niveśanaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy19:565: upasaṁkramya dauvārikaṁ puruṣamāmantrayate—gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, anaṅgaṇasya gṛhapateḥ kathaya—kauśikagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati bhavantaṁ draṣṭukāma iti |
divy19:566: sa kathayati—brāhmaṇa, gṛhapatinā ahaṁ sthāpitah—yaḥ kaścid yācanaka āgacchati, sa yat prāthayate, taddātavyaṁ na tu praveśa iti |
divy19:568: kiṁ te gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭeneti? sa kathayati—bhoḥ puruṣa, na mama kenacit prayojanam |
divy19:571: tenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapatergatvā niveditam—ārya, kauśikasagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati āryaṁ draṣṭukāma iti |
divy19:572: sa kathayati—gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, yena taysa prayojanaṁ tat prayaccha—kiṁ tenātra praviṣṭeneti? sa kathayati—ārya, ukto mayā evaṁ kathayati—nāhaṁ kiṁcit prārthayāmi, api tu gṛhapatimeva draṣṭukāma iti |
divy19:575: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati—kasmāt tvaṁ gṛhapate kare kapolaṁ cintāparastiṣṭhasīti? sa gṛhapatirgāthāṁ bhāṣate— na tasya kathayecchokam yaḥ śokānna pramocayet |
divy19:578: śakraḥ kathayati—gṛhapate, kastava śokah? kathaya, ahaṁ te śokātpramocayāmīti |
divy19:580: atha śakro devendraḥ kauśikabrāhmaṇarūpamantardhāpy svarūpeṇa sthitvā kathayati—gṛhapate, viśvakarmā te devaputraḥ sāhāyyaṁ kalpayiṣyatītyuktvā prakrāntaḥ |
divy19:581: atha śakro devendro devāṁstrāyastriṁśān gatvā viśvakarmāṇaṁ devaputramāmantrayate—gaccha, viśvakarman, anaṅgaṇasya gṛhapateḥ sāhāyyaṁ kalpaya |
divy19:582: paraṁ bhadraṁ tava kauśiketi viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya āgataḥ |
divy19:583: prativiśiṣṭatarā nagaraśobhā nirmitā, divyo maṇḍalavāṭo divyāsanaprajñaptirdivya āhāraḥ samanvāhṛtaḥ |
divy19:584: airāvaṇo nāgarājo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṁ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati, avaśiṣṭā nāgā avaśiṣṭānāṁ bhikṣūṇām |
divy19:585: śacī devakanyā vipaśyinaṁ samyaksambuddhaṁ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati, avaśiṣṭā apsaraso bhikṣūn |
divy19:586: bandhumatā rājñā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah—gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa, kīdṛśenāhāreṇānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatir buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ tarpayatīti? sa puruṣastatra gatastāṁ vibhūtiṁ dṛṣṭvā tatraiva avasthitaḥ |
divy19:591: tato bandhumān rājā svayameva taddvāraṁ gatvā avasthitaḥ |
divy19:592: vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ kathayati—gṛhapate, bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭasatyaḥ |
divy19:596: tenāsau nirgatya kṣamita uktaśca—mahārāja, praviśa svahastena pariveṣaṇaṁ kuru |
divy19:599: dṛṣṭvā ca paraṁ vismayamāpannaḥ kathayati—gṛhapate, tvamevaiko ’rhasi dine dine buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ bhojayituṁ na vayaṁtī |
divy19:600: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirvipaśyinaṁ samyaksambuddhamanayā vibhūtyā traimāsyaṁ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṁtarpya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṁ kartumārabdhah—yanmayā evaṁvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārā kṛtā, anenāhaṁ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam, divyamānuṣīṁ śriyaṁ pratyanubhaveyam, evaṁvidhānāṁ dharmāṇāṁ lābhī syām, evaṁvidhameva śāstāramārāgayeyaṁ mā virāgayeyamiti |
divy19:602: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo ’sau anaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatiḥ, eṣa evāsau jyotiṣkaḥ kulaputrastena kālena tena samayena |
divy19:603: yadanena bandhumato rājño dṛṣṭasatyasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā, tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañcaśatāni samātṛkaścitāyāmāropya dhmāpitaḥ |
divy19:605: yadvipaśyini tathāgate kārāṁ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṁ kṛtam, tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ |
divy19:608: ahamanena vipaśyinā samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṁ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ |
divy19:609: iti hi bhikṣavah ekāntakṛṣṇānāṁ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānāmekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṁ vyatimiśraḥ |
divy19:610: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
